name: Academics
description: Student is struggling with academics or wants advice on how to handle a class

name: College/Career
description: Student is looking for advice about their future whether related to college or their career

name: Course Selection
description: Student is deciding which courses to take for future semesters or discussing changing current classes

name: Personal Wellbeing
description: Student wants to discuss issues with their personal wellbeing

name: Social Issues
description: Student is having issues socially that they want to discuss

name: Family Concerns
description: Student is having issues outside of school that they want to discuss

name: Behavioral Matters
description: Student has had recent behavioral issues that need to be addressed

name: Stress/Anxiety
description: Student is dealing with stress or anxiety that they need help navigating
